SocialMediaPosting.headline: Dr. Anna Arlotta-Guerrero’s Story - Pittsburgh Educator - TodayPGH
SocialMediaPosting.text:
“One day, I hope the positive movements that have occurred over these past years bring understanding and truth to people…”

– Dr. Anna Arlotta-Guerrero, Associate Professor of Practice @PittEducation https://www.todaypgh.com/story/2020/positive-movements-bring-understanding-truth-people/
